Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.aiCareerChatDesc: Get personalized career advice. Ask questions about your career path and get instant AI guidance.
Dashboard.aiCvMakerDesc: Create a professional CV with AI assistance

Resume.title: Resume Analyzer
Resume.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, TXT, JPG, PNG, WebP (max 10MB)
Resume.errorType: Please upload PDF, DOCX, TXT, JPG, PNG, or WebP files only
Resume.errorSize: File size must be less than 10MB
Resume.errorFailed: Failed to analyze resume. Please try again.

SkillGap.title: Skill Gap Analysis
SkillGap.cardDesc: Your skills have been auto-filled from your CV. Enter your target role to analyze.
SkillGap.targetRolePlaceholder: e.g., Senior Software Engineer, Data Scientist
SkillGap.currentSkillsPlaceholder: List your current skills, experience, and expertise...
SkillGap.errorFailed: Failed to analyze skills. Please try again.

CVBuilder.title: AI CV Builder
CVBuilder.subtitle: Create a professional CV with AI assistance.
CVBuilder.noExperienceYet: No experience entries yet. Click "Add Experience" to get started.
CVBuilder.noEducationYet: No education entries yet. Click "Add Education" to get started.
CVBuilder.noProjectsYet: No project entries yet. Click "Add Project" to get started.

CVMaker.title: AI CV Maker
CVMaker.subtitle: Create and improve your CV based on AI analysis and suggestions
CVMaker.personalInfoDesc: Verify or update your contact details for the CV header.
CVMaker.projectPlaceholder: Project Name: Description of the project, technologies used, and your role...
CVMaker.experiencePlaceholder: Describe your work experience with achievements and impact...
CVMaker.noWeaknesses: Upload a CV to see improvement areas

Chat.title: AI Career Mentor
Chat.welcome1: Hello! I am your AI Career Mentor.
Chat.welcome2: Ask me about resume tips, interview prep, or career paths.
Chat.error: Sorry, there was an error processing your request.

Interview.title: Interview Preparation
Interview.cardDesc: Get AI-generated questions and feedback on your answers

AIContext.pleaseFillRequired: Please fill in all required fields
AIContext.generationFailed: Failed to generate content. Please try again.

summary.title: AI Professional Summary
summary.description: Provide some context to generate a personalized professional summary
summary.skillsPlaceholder: e.g., React, Node.js, Python, Team Leadership

experience.title: AI Experience Description
experience.description: Tell us about this role to generate compelling bullet points
experience.responsibilitiesPlaceholder: e.g., Built user interfaces, collaborated with design team
experience.achievementsPlaceholder: e.g., Improved page load time by 40%, led migration to React

project.title: AI Project Description
project.description: Describe your project to generate a professional description
project.outcomesPlaceholder: e.g., Increased conversion by 25%, served 100k users

skills.title: AI Skills Generation
skills.description: Help us understand your background to suggest relevant skills
skills.focusPlaceholder: e.g., Frontend, Backend, DevOps, Machine Learning

hero.title: Unlock Your Career Potential
hero.subtitle: AI-powered career guidance, resume reviews, and interview preparation ‚Äî all in one place.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: A complete toolkit to accelerate your career growth

resume.title: Smart Resume Analysis
resume.desc: Upload your CV and get instant AI feedback. Get an ATS-friendliness score, identify weaknesses, and receive tailored suggestions.

skillGap.title: Skill Gap Analysis
skillGap.desc: Discover exactly which skills you need for your target role and get a personalized learning roadmap.

interview.title: Mock Interviews
interview.desc: Practice with AI-driven interview questions matched to your role and seniority level. Get instant, detailed feedback.

items.quote: The CV analysis feature pointed out things I'd been missing for months. Got an interview within 2 weeks of fixing them.
items.name: Nguyen Minh Tuan

items.quote: The mock interview feature is incredibly realistic. It helped me confidently answer behavioral questions I used to struggle with.
items.name: Tran Thi Lan

items.quote: Skill gap analysis showed me exactly what to learn. I followed the roadmap and landed a promotion in 3 months.
items.name: Le Van Duc
